main event: An unidentified object was observed in the Taft, California area on 05/07/59, described as the size of a basketball and silver in color.
interesting points: The object was seen moving with the wind at a lower craft level., It had a constant flight level and made no sound., The object appeared during the day and was observed from the ground., The sighting lasted approximately 1.5 seconds., It may have been mistaken for a balloon or an aircraft.
sighted object: one silver object resembling a basketball
